sense.name: emphasize
sense.examples: The workshop highlighted the commonalities and differences in the mix of approaches. He highlighted the user involvement in the Indian space programme. Morris highlighted that what is required by the agriculturalists is water. Turner excelled in roles that highlighted her sexuality and working-class roots.

sense.name: make lighter or visually more prominent
sense.examples: The vocabulary words have been highlighted the first time they appear in the text. Click the entry under 'Account', then highlight the order number. She highlighted her eyebrows with glittering pink eyeshadow. You've highlighted your hair! It looks wonderful!
